rowers.collegeResults: 2015 IRA National Championships (Freshman 8+) - 1st, 2017 IRA National Championships (2nd 8+) - 1st, 2018 IRA National Championships (Varsity 8+) - 2nd, 2019 IRA National Championships (Varsity 8+) - 2nd

rowers.facts: Born in Durham, England. Enjoys sports, intermediate crossword puzzles, breakfast burritos (with tater tots inside) and spending time with his parent's bulldog, Rodney
